AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

ReserveUpdated(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Emitted when the state of a reserve is updated

disableReserveAsCollateral(address).details: disables a reserve to be used as collateral

disableReserveStableBorrowRate(address).details: disable the stable borrow rate mode on a reserve

enableBorrowingOnReserve(address,bool).details: enables borrowing on a reserve. Also sets the stable rate borrowing

params._stableBorrowRateEnabled: true if the stable rate needs to be enabled, false otherwise*

enableReserveAsCollateral(address,uint25.details: enables a reserve to be used as collateral

enableReserveStableBorrowRate(address).details: enable the stable borrow rate mode on a reserve

getReserveATokenAddress(address).details: gets the aToken contract address for the reserve

returns._0: the address of the aToken contract*

getReserveAvailableLiquidity(address).details: gets the available liquidity in the reserve. The available liquidity is the balance of the core contract

returns._0: the available liquidity*

getReserveConfiguration(address).details: this function aggregates the configuration parameters of the reserve. It's used in the LendingPoolDataProvider specifically to save gas, and avoid multiple external contract calls to fetch the same data.

returns._0: the reserve decimals
returns._3: if the reserve is used as collateral or not*

getReserveCurrentAverageStableBorrowRate.details: gets the reserve average stable borrow rate. The average stable rate is the weighted average of all the loans taken at stable rate.

returns._0: the reserve current average borrow rate*
the reserve liquidity rate*

getReserveCurrentStableBorrowRate(addres.details: gets the reserve current stable borrow rate. Is the market rate if the reserve is empty

returns._0: the reserve current stable borrow rate*

getReserveCurrentVariableBorrowRate(addr.details: gets the reserve current variable borrow rate. Is the base variable borrow rate if the reserve is empty

returns._0: the reserve current variable borrow rate*

getReserveDecimals(address).details: returns the decimals of the reserve

returns._0: the reserve decimals*

getReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress(ad.details: gets the interest rate strategy contract address for the reserve

returns._0: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

getReserveIsActive(address).details: returns true if the reserve is active

returns._0: true if the reserve is active, false otherwise*

params._reserve: the reserve for which the information is needed

returns._0: true if the reserve is freezed, false otherwise*

getReserveIsStableBorrowRateEnabled(addr.details: returns true if the stable rate is enabled on reserve

returns._0: true if the stable rate is enabled on reserve, false otherwise*

params._reserve: the reserve for which the information is needed

returns.timestamp: the last updated timestamp of the reserve*

returns._0: the reserve liquidation bonus*
the reserve liquidation threshold*

getReserveLiquidityCumulativeIndex(addre.details: gets the reserve liquidity cumulative index

returns._0: the reserve liquidity cumulative index*

getReserveNormalizedIncome(address).details: gets the normalized income of the reserve. a value of 1e27 means there is no income. A value of 2e27 means there there has been 100% income.

returns._0: the reserve normalized income*
the total borrows (stable + variable)*

getReserveTotalBorrowsStable(address).details: gets the reserve total borrows stable

returns._0: the total borrows stable*

getReserveTotalBorrowsVariable(address).details: gets the reserve total borrows variable

returns._0: the total borrows variable*

getReserveTotalLiquidity(address).details: gets the total liquidity in the reserve. The total liquidity is the balance of the core contract + total borrows

returns._0: the total liquidity*

getReserveUtilizationRate(address).details: returns the utilization rate U of a specific reserve

params._reserve: the reserve for which the information is needed

returns._0: the utilization rate in ray*

getReserveVariableBorrowsCumulativeIndex.details: gets the reserve variable borrow index

returns._0: the reserve variable borrow index*
the array of reserves configured on the core*

getUserBasicReserveData(address,address).details: returns the basic data (balances, fee accrued, reserve enabled/disabled as collateral) needed to calculate the global account data in the LendingPoolDataProvider

params._user: the address of the user

returns._0: the user deposited balance, the principal borrow balance, the fee, and if the reserve is enabled as collateral or not*

getUserBorrowBalances(address,address).details: calculates and returns the borrow balances of the user

params._user: the address of the user

returns._0: the principal borrow balance, the compounded balance and the balance increase since the last borrow/repay/swap/rebalance*

getUserCurrentBorrowRateMode(address,add.details: users with no loans in progress have NONE as borrow rate mode

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

returns._0: the borrow rate mode for the user,*

getUserCurrentStableBorrowRate(address,a.details: the stable rate returned is 0 if the user is borrowing at variable or not borrowing at all

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

returns._0: the user stable rate*

getUserLastUpdate(address,address).details: the variable borrow index of the user is 0 if the user is not borrowing or borrowing at stable

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed*

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

returns._0: the origination fee for the user*

getUserUnderlyingAssetBalance(address,ad.details: gets the underlying asset balance of a user based on the corresponding aToken balance.

params._user: the user address

returns._0: the underlying deposit balance of the user*

getUserVariableBorrowCumulativeIndex(add.details: the variable borrow index of the user is 0 if the user is not borrowing or borrowing at stable

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

returns._0: the variable borrow index for the user*

params._aTokenAddress: the address of the overlying aToken contract
params._decimals: the decimals of the reserve currency
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

initialize(address).details: initializes the Core contract, invoked upon registration on the AddressesProvider

isReserveBorrowingEnabled(address).details: returns true if the reserve is enabled for borrowing

returns._0: true if the reserve is enabled for borrowing, false otherwise*

isReserveUsageAsCollateralEnabled(addres.details: returns true if the reserve is enabled as collateral

returns._0: true if the reserve is enabled as collateral, false otherwise*

isUserAllowedToBorrowAtStable(address,ad.details: checks if a user is allowed to borrow at a stable rate

params._amount: the amount the the user wants to borrow
params._user: the user

returns._0: true if the user is allowed to borrow at a stable rate, false otherwise*

params._reserve: the address of the reserve for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

returns._0: true if the user has chosen to use the reserve as collateral, false otherwise*

liquidateFee(address,uint256,address).details: transfers the fees to the fees collection address in the case of liquidation

params._token: the address of the token being transferred

refreshConfiguration().details: updates the lending pool core configuration*

removeLastAddedReserve(address).details: removes the last added reserve in the reservesList array

setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress(ad.details: updates the address of the interest rate strategy contract

params._rateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

setUserUseReserveAsCollateral(address,ad.details: enables or disables a reserve as collateral

params._reserve: the address of the principal reserve where the user deposited
params._useAsCollateral: true if the depositor wants to use the reserve as collateral*
params._user: the address of the depositor

transferToFeeCollectionAddress(address,a.details: transfers the protocol fees to the fees collection address

params._token: the address of the token being transferred
params._user: the address of the user from where the transfer is happening

transferToReserve(address,address,uint25.details: transfers an amount from a user to the destination reserve

params._reserve: the address of the reserve where the amount is being transferred
params._user: the address of the user from where the transfer is happening

transferToUser(address,address,uint256).details: transfers to the user a specific amount from the reserve.

params._reserve: the address of the reserve where the transfer is happening
params._user: the address of the user receiving the transfer

updateStateOnBorrow(address,address,uint.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a borrow action.

params._borrowFee: the fee on the amount borrowed
params._reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user is borrowing
params._user: the address of the borrower

returns._0: the new borrow rate for the user*

updateStateOnDeposit(address,address,uin.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a deposit action

params._isFirstDeposit: true if the user is depositing for the first time*
params._reserve: the address of the reserve in which the deposit is happening
params._user: the address of the the user depositing

updateStateOnFlashLoan(address,uint256,u.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a flashloan action

params._income: the income of the protocol as a result of the action*
params._reserve: the address of the reserve in which the flashloan is happening

updateStateOnLiquidation(address,address.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a liquidation action.

params._amountToLiquidate: the amount being repaid by the liquidator
params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._collateralReserve: the address of the collateral reserve that is being liquidated
params._collateralToLiquidate: the amount of collateral being liquidated
params._feeLiquidated: the amount of origination fee being liquidated
params._liquidatedCollateralForFee: the amount of collateral equivalent to the origination fee + bonus
params._liquidatorReceivesAToken: true if the liquidator will receive aTokens, false otherwise*
params._principalReserve: the address of the principal reserve that is being repaid
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnRebalance(address,address,u.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a stable rate rebalance

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._reserve: the address of the principal reserve where the user borrowed
params._user: the address of the borrower

returns._0: the new stable rate for the user*

updateStateOnRedeem(address,address,uint.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a redeem action

params._reserve: the address of the reserve in which the redeem is happening
params._user: the address of the the user redeeming
params._userRedeemedEverything: true if the user is redeeming everything*

updateStateOnRepay(address,address,uint2.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a repay action.

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._originationFeeRepaid: the fee on the amount that is being repaid
params._paybackAmountMinusFees: the amount being paid back minus fees
params._repaidWholeLoan: true if the user is repaying the whole loan*
params._reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user is repaying
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnSwapRate(address,address,ui.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a swap rate action.

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._compoundedBorrowBalance: the amount borrowed plus accrued interest
params._currentRateMode: the current interest rate mode for the user*
params._principalBorrowBalance: the amount borrowed by the user
params._reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user is repaying
params._user: the address of the borrower

freezeReserve(address).notice: allows the configurator to freeze the reserve. A freezed reserve does not allow any action apart from repay, redeem, liquidationCall, rebalance.

getReserveIsFreezed(address).notice: returns if a reserve is freezed

getReserveLastUpdate(address).notice: returns the timestamp of the last action on the reserve

setReserveBaseLTVasCollateral(address,ui.notice: allows the configurator to update the loan to value of a reserve

setReserveDecimals(address,uint256).notice: allows the configurator to update the reserve decimals

setReserveLiquidationBonus(address,uint2.notice: allows the configurator to update the liquidation bonus of a reserve

setReserveLiquidationThreshold(address,u.notice: allows the configurator to update the liquidation threshold of a reserve

unfreezeReserve(address).notice: allows the configurator to unfreeze the reserve. A unfreezed reserve allows any action to be executed.
